thread.title: Fire in NE Rochester displaces 11

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Fire in NE Rochester displaces 11
text:
A fire late Friday displaced three adults and eight children. Morgan Martin, a spokeswoman for the American Red Cross, said two apartments at 36 Widman St. in northeast Rochester were uninhabitable after the fire. The Red Cross was providing food, housing and clothing to the residents.
The fire began shortly before midnight, with heavy smoke and flames reported to be coming from the first floor of the 2Â½-story frame house. It was declared under control at 12:38 a.m. Saturday.
